game

Class Planet

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Planet

  • public class Planet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class conatins data for backgroud planet, sets its position as it drifts across screen.
    Author:
    JustinDowty, Ted Lang, Alec Allain
